welcome_message_body: Welcome to Beylikduzu, Turkey! Get ready to immerse yourself in the charming atmosphere of this coastal city known for its beautiful beaches, vibrant culture, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Beylikduzu has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Istanbul Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to international flights, providing a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Istanbul Airport serves flights within Turkey, with a range of facilities and shops for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport, with a network name of 'IST Airport Free WiFi'.
